com.github.nosan.embedded.cassandra

Class EmbeddedCassandra

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.nosan.embedded.cassandra.Cassandra
      • com.github.nosan.embedded.cassandra.EmbeddedCassandra

  • public class EmbeddedCassandra
extends Cassandra
    Cassandra extension which adds functionality not only to start Apache Cassandra, but a Cluster creation as well.
    Author:
    Dmytro Nosan
    See Also:
    Cassandra, CqlScriptUtils

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EmbeddedCassandra(BootstrapSettings settings, CqlScript... scripts)
      Create Apache Casandra with a custom BootstrapSettings.
      EmbeddedCassandra(CqlScript... scripts)
      Create Apache Casandra with a default BootstrapSettings.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
           throws CassandraException
        Starts the Apache Cassandra. Calling this method on an already started Apache Cassandra has no effect.

        Creates a Cluster to Apache Cassandra and executes CqlScripts

        Overrides:
        start in class Cassandra
        Throws:
        CassandraException - if the Apache Cassandra cannot be started

      • stop

        public void stop()
          throws CassandraException
        Stops the Apache Cassandra. Calling this method on an already stopped Apache Cassandra has no effect.

        Closes a Cluster to Apache Cassandra.

        Overrides:
        stop in class Cassandra
        Throws:
        CassandraException - if the Apache Cassandra cannot be stopped

        a Cluster

      • getSession

        public com.datastax.driver.core.Session getSession()
        Creates a new session on Cluster and initialize it.
        Returns:
        a new session on this cluster sets to no keyspace.
        See Also:
        Cluster.connect()
